original: MCI Communications Corp., a leading telecommunications provider, has entered into a 10-year agreement with NextWave Telecom Inc. which will enable it to compete with the top tier of U.S. wireless providers. The deal will see MCI leasing NextWave's extensive wireless spectrum holdings, enabling it to offer high-speed wireless services to its customers. The move is viewed as a significant step for M
